Module lanej.inventorysystem

Package lanej.inventorysystem.controller

package lanej.inventorysystem.controller
This package provides the controller classes used to interface with the user's actions within the GUI. It negotiates with the elements provided in the FXML view files, which are provided in this project's resources/lanej/inventorysystem/view directory. These controller classes utilize the classes provided in lanej.inventorysystem.model.

The 'MainScreen' class controls the first screen that greets the user, and is associated with main-screen.fxml

The 'AddPart' controller class is associated with the 'add-part.fxml' scene

The 'AddProduct' controller class is associated with the 'add-product.fxml' scene

The 'ModifyPart' controller class is associated with the 'modify-part.fxml' scene

The 'ModifyProduct' controller class is associated with the 'modify-product.fxml' scene

See Also:

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    lanej.inventorysystem
    Contains the classes and interfaces related to managing inventory for a business.
    lanej.inventorysystem.model
    This package primarily provides the classes used to abstract the handling of inventory items within the inventory management software.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddPart
    The AddPart class is responsible for managing the user interface and functionality of the Add Part screen in the inventory management system.
    AddProduct
    The AddProduct class is responsible for managing the user interface and functionality of the Add Product screen in the inventory management system.
    MainScreen
    The MainScreen class is responsible for managing the user interface and functionality of the main (landing) screen in the inventory management system.
    ModifyPart
    The ModifyPart class is responsible for managing the user interface and functionality of the Modify Part screen in the inventory management system.
    ModifyProduct
    The ModifyProduct class is responsible for managing the user interface and functionality of the Modify Product screen in the inventory management system.
